properties.value: A rune platebody (h3) is an item obtained from hard Treasure Trails. All of the rune heraldic platebodies have the same stat bonuses as the rune platebody. As with all Treasure Trails and rune armour, this cannot be made with the Smithing skill. It requires 40 Defence to equip, as well as completion of Dragon Slayer I.

Item ID23215

A rune platebody (h3) is an item obtained from hard Treasure Trails. All of the rune heraldic platebodies have the same stat bonuses as the rune platebody. As with all Treasure Trails and rune armour, this cannot be made with the Smithing skill. It requires 40 Defence to equip, as well as completion of Dragon Slayer I.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-30-15
 Defence bonuses
+82+80+72-6+80
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The platebody's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -10 to -15.

[[File:Rune platebody (h3) detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''rune platebody (h3)''' is an item obtained from [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]] [[Treasure Trails]]. All of the rune heraldic platebodies have the same stat bonuses as the [[rune platebody]]. As with all Treasure Trails and [[rune armour]], this cannot be made with the [[Smithing]] [[skill]]. It requires 40 [[Defence]] to equip, as well as completion of [[Dragon Slayer I]].
